<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;">Interesting - do you have a link to that blind test? <br> I'd like to learn more about their methodology.<br><br><br><br>--- On <b>Sat, 1/17/09, Ron Lederer <i><ronriko@...></i></b> wrote:<br><blockquote style="border-left: 2px solid rgb(16, 16, 255); margin-left: 5px; padding-left: 5px;"><br>From: Ron Lederer <ronriko@...><br>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Need volenters  for validation experiment<br>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<br>Date: Saturday, January 17, 2009, 8:56 AM<br><br><div id="yiv1362048541">

            <p><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tbody><tr><td style="font-family: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-size-adjust: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -x-system-font: none;" valign="top">Sounds good.  Count me in on the test.  By the way, some here might be interested in knowing that the American Association of EVP did a similar blind test and their results showed about a 33% hit rate for people getting the same words from a file.  That would be a pretty good number to match, I would think.  Sarcasum can be an effective way to make things happen at times. And that's not being sarcastic.   lol   ron<br><br>
